name: Steel Panthers: World at War - Guadalcanal 1942
name_original: Steel Panthers: World at War - Guadalcanal 1942
description:
Steel Panthers: World at War - Guadalcanal 1942 is a strategy game developed by Matrix Games. It was originally released in 2002. It was published by Matrix Games.
You can play Steel Panthers: World at War - Guadalcanal 1942 on PC.
